snippet: The Bank of England showed no sign it was close to raising interest rates, voting on Thursday to keep them at 0.5 percent, a record low.
abstract: Bank of England decides to keep interest rates at record low of 0.5 percent.
lead_paragraph: The Bank of England showed no sign it was close to raising interest rates, voting on Thursday to keep them at 0.5 percent, a record low.

headline.print_headline: Bank of England Maintains Interest Rate at 0.5%.
headline.main: Bank of England Maintains Interest Rate at 0.5%.
